page.title: 17Clubs in Pembury
page.content: The junior and senior sections of the {Youth Club}have been open nine months, the junior club being particularly popular. The senior club is open on Mondays and Wednesdays, it is attended by about 25 on each evening. On Tuesdays and Thursdays there are weight lifting classes. More help is needed because those running the club are so busy that they do not have time for fund raising activities. The{Scout and Guide Associations}are also very active in Pembury. There are 2 Brownie Groups and 2 Guide Groups, Cubs and Scouts. They are trying to raise money to build a headquarters. Draws, garage sales, sponsored events, have all helped to raise Â£13,300. The Village Fete and Craft Exhibition will hopefully raise more. The proposed site is near Woodhill Park.
